Functions
lz_init

Initialize variables lz_in_bnk and lz_in for lz_decode to work on correct data.

Parameter
lz_idx

LZ block index

lz_decode

Decode a lz encoded block/text and save the result into ram.

Parameters
lz_in

pointer to text block

lz_in_bnk

bank of the text block

/!\ Use tmp[0..7] /!\

/!\ change PRG banks 1, 2 and RAM bank during execution, banks are restore at return /!\
